title: Tastefully Yours
overview: Tastefully Yours depicts the story of Han Bum Woo, the successor of a large food company, who runs the best fine dining restaurant in Seoul but has no interest in 'taste', and Mo Yun Joo, a chef crazy about 'taste' who runs a one-table restaurant without a sign in a remote corner of the countryside. They grow together and fall in love while running a small restaurant in the city of Miraek, Jeonju.
